title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4240.4 - Eligible and ineligible uses of program assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4240.4 - Eligible and ineligible uses of program assistance

State Regulations
(a) Program assistance may be sought and used
for the purposes set forth in the descriptions herein of each form of program
assistance. (b) Program assistance
shall not be used for any of the following purposes: (1)
refinancing, retiring or liquidating
existing debt or equity; (2)
residential construction projects; (3)
payment of any tax arrearages; and
(4)
payment of employee benefit
arrearages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4240.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
